title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A gripping, heart-wrenching, and wholly remarkable tale of coming-of-age in a South poisoned by virulent prejudice.

title: Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
author: Robert C. Martin
description: Even bad code can function. But if code isn’t clean, it can bring a development organization to its knees. Every year, countless hours and significant resources are lost because of poorly written code. But it doesn’t have to be that way.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: An unforgettable memoir about a young girl who, kept out of school, leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

title: The Daily
description: A daily news podcast by The New York Times.

title: Beethoven: Symphony No. 9
description: A recording of Beethoven's Symphony No. 9.

title: The Joe Rogan Experience
description: A long-form conversation hosted by comedian Joe Rogan.

title: Inception
description: A mind-bending thriller about dream invasion.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulation.

title: The Godfather
description: The story of a powerful Italian-American crime family.
